services.title: Film Score
services.content: Carefully chosen colors and textures to enhance the story on screen. Whatever the genre that you want to bring to life, I'll write memorable themes and compelling underscore to captivate your audience.

services.title: Game Soundtrack
services.content: Engaging music that will immerse your player in the world that you're developing. From chiptune style to modern, there is a catchy tune waiting to be written.

services.title: Song Arrangement
services.content: Pairing music to your lyrics to create a powerful song. A collaborative process that will enhance the message of your lyrics. Pitch me your idea and I'll do the rest.

sellingPoints.title: Versatile and Unique Background
sellingPoints.content: The combination of earning a music degree, conducting in front of orchestras, playing in a rock band as well as a non-conventional junkyard percussion group (similiar to STOMP) has given me a unique perspective in writing music. Whether you need music for a quirky, comedic sketch or a sweeping orchestral fantasy, I have the experience to back it up.  But don't take my word for it, sample and hear some of my music here!

sellingPoints.title: Dedicated & Reliable
sellingPoints.content: I understand that every project is unique and important to you. That's why I make sure that my schedule is open before committing to yours so that I can give full attention and effort to the project at hand. I do my best to focus only on one project at a time so that I can follow through and deliver on time.

sellingPoints.title: Quality Assured
sellingPoints.content: Feel confident that you are going to get the best quality music for your budget.  I ensure that you are happy with the music composition and production quality upon delivery.  That's how I have retained so many clients and I hope to do the same for you.

bioPage.title: Joshua Sohn
bioPage.subtitle: Film Composer / Songwriter
bio: Hi! I team up with great artists, film makers, game developers and businesses to write music that help elevate, engage, and inspire their message.

My name is Joshua Sohn. Much of my childhood was surrounded by the tune of church hymns, classical symphonies and rock music.  The turning point of my musical journey came when my mother passed away at age 14. While coping her loss, I used music to help express what I was feeling. The power of music became a source of healing and now would like to pass that on to others with my own writing.

Now almost 20 years later, I've developed a career in music, working with TV (Air Force Reserve, Dwight in Shining armor), feature films (Resilience and the Lost Gems, The Adventure of A.R.I.: My Robot Friend) and various production music companies including Velvet Green Music, AMADEA, and Gothic Storm.
